name: Ahmed Ali
text: WHEN WHAT IS to happen comes to pass --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Which is bound to happen undoubtedly --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Degrading (some) and exalting (others);

name: Ahmed Ali
text: When the earth is shaken up convulsively,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The mountains bruised and crushed,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Turned to dust, floating in the air,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You will become three categories:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Those of the right hand -- how (happy) will be those of the right hand!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) will be those of the left hand!

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then the foremost, how pre-excellent,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Who will be honoured

name: Ahmed Ali
text: In gardens of tranquility;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: A number of the earlier peoples,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And a few of later ages,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: On couches wrought of gold,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Reclining face to face.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Youths of never-ending bloom will pass round to them

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Cups and decanters, beakers full of sparkling wine,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Unheady, uninebriating;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And such fruits as they fancy,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Bird meats that they relish,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And companions with big beautiful eyes

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Like pearls within their shells,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: As recompense for all they had done.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will hear no nonsense there or talk of sin,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Other than "Peace, peace" the salutation.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: As for those of the right hand -- how (happy) those of the right hand --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They will be in (the shade) of thornless lote

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And acacia covered with heaps of bloom,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Lengthened shadows,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Gushing water,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And fruits numberless,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Unending, unforbidden,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And maidens incomparable.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have formed them in a distinctive fashion,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And made them virginal,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Loving companions matched in age,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: For those of the right hand.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: A crowd of earlier generations

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And a crowd of the later.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But those of the left hand -- how (unhappy) those of the left hand --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Will be in the scorching wind and boiling water,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Under the shadow of thick black smoke

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Neither cool nor agreeable.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: They were endowed with good things

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But persisted in that greater sin,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And said: "What! When we are dead and turned to dust and bones, shall we then be raised again?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And so will our fathers?"

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Say: "Indeed, the earlier and the later generations

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Will be gathered together on a certain day which is predetermined.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then you, the erring and the deniers,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Will eat of the tree of Zaqqum,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Fill your bellies with it,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And drink over it scalding water,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Lapping it up like female camels raging of thirst with disease."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Such will be their welcome on the Day of Judgement.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It is He who created you, then why do you not affirm the truth?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Just consider (the semen) that you emit,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do you create it, or We are its creator?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have incorporated death in your constitution, and We shall not be hindered

name: Ahmed Ali
text: From replacing you with others or raising you in a way you do not know.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You have known the first creation, then why do you not reflect?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Just ponder over what you sow:

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do you give it its increase, or are We the giver?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We could turn it, if We pleased, into straw; then you would rue the day,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (And say:) "We have fallen into debt;

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Indeed, we have been deprived of the fruits of our labour."

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Consider the water that you drink.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Do you send it down from the clouds, or We send it down?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We could make it brackish, if We pleased; so why do you not acknowledge thanks?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Consider the fire that you strike (and get by friction).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Have you raised its tree, or We have raised it?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We have made it as a reminder and convenience for the needy.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: So I call the placement of the stars to witness --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And this surely is great evidence if you can understand --

name: Ahmed Ali
text: That this is indeed the glorious Qur'an

name: Ahmed Ali
text: (Inscribed) in the well-kept Book.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Only they can reach it who are clean (of mind).

name: Ahmed Ali
text: It has been revealed by the Lord of all the worlds.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then why do you dissimulate this Revelation?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: You live by calling it a lie.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then how is it that when the (dying) breath is withdrawn into the throat (and rattles),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And you wait for the moment (of death),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: We are closer to him than you, even though you cannot see?

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then why, if you are not indebted (to Us for life),

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Can you not bring him back? (Answer) if you are truthful

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then, if he is one of the honoured,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There will be peace and plenty, and gardens of tranquility for him.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: If he is of those of the right hand,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: There will be the salutation by those of the right hand: "Peace on you.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: But if he is of the deniers and the errants,

name: Ahmed Ali
text: The welcome will be boiling water

name: Ahmed Ali
text: And the roasting in Hell.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: This is indeed the ultimate truth.

name: Ahmed Ali
text: Then praise your Lord, the most supreme.
